name: Meta Frog 2
description:
Code and Design by Jacob Naasz

Art by Bobby Frye

----------------

WASD/Arrow Keys to face a direction

Space/Enter to jump

-----------------

Music by 505 - http://freemusicarchive.org/music/505/ licensed under a Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike License.

Sound FX made on BFXR.net

This is not Frog Fractions 2. Made for the #Duplicade game jam.
